bibl.author: Jane Stansberry
bibl.title: Jane Stansberry to Walt Whitman, 15 July 1874
bibl.orgName: Trent Collection of Whitmaniana, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

body.p:
Dear Friend It is with Pleasure I take the opportunity of writing you a letter As my Husband became Acquainted with you In Washington. And He Has took So much time And pleasure In telling me of you. And How kind you were to Him that you Seem to me Almost Like a brother. And I Have often thought of writing to you. William Received Some papers from you yesterday Which we All take great pleasure In Reading And,
Aspearaly especially those Poems you Have written, they Are Splendid. ther There is a Preaspeterian Presbyterian Minister Trevening Traveling with
my Sister who takes great delight In Reading those Papers
His Home Is In Philadelphia His Name is David Myrdock
Well you Said you would Like to visit Howard Lake. I wished you would for I do believe you would get your Health Hear Here We would be Happy to Have you visit us, But we are Poor.

We have found out what the Privatians Privations of life is Since we came west we Came Here For williams William's Health He was very Healthy Before he went to the Army. they Sent him home From Washington withewith the fever He Meet his Brother In one mild of Home He Passed By him as He would a Stranger He did Not know Him He Has Never Received Nothing From the government. I think He Aught to Have a pentian pension .. I thought I would Ask your Advice
And Asistence Assistance In trying For A pentian pension .. I will Send you His Discharge you will Please give me your Advice. tell me if you think He can get a pentian pension And How to get it.......... & We are expecting a letter From you their there Has been two Letters written to you Since we Received Any Answer one was sent the first of June & one Since I see In the papers you Sent Reports From Camden of the 4 dat of July their there was a Sabath Sabbath School Pipnic Picnic Here My Mother & Father wor were there My Mother Is very old I don't Suppose She will Be with us on the of July In the comeing coming year
Well I hope you will get your Health Better, you Will Please Excuse this
